author: Brad Hem
title: Media Advisory: iland Earns Recognitions for Strength of Cloud, Disaster Recovery Solutions
text:
iland is proud to announce two new instances of recognition the company has received. On Sept. 1, iland was named a Finalist for the Best of VMworld 2015 – Disaster Recovery and Backup for Virtualized Environments. On Aug. 25, the company made its first appearance on the 2015 Talkin’ Cloud 100 list of top cloud service providers, entering at No. 53. The Best of VMworld 2015 Awards recognize the most innovative new products in the server virtualization, cloud and end-user computing markets. A panel of expert judges evaluated 153 nominated products on display at VMworld 2015 based on innovation, value, performance, reliability and ease-of-use.
“We’re honored to receive this recognition,” said Dante Orsini, senior vice president of Business Development at iland. “We’ve been investing in our cloud services in general – and our disaster-recovery-as-a-service in particular – for years now, so it’s extremely fulfilling to have those efforts recognized by such reputable organizations.”
To learn more about iland’s award-winning DRaaS, visit here: http://www.iland.com/services/cloud-disaster-recovery/
About iland
With data centers in the U.S., U.K. and Singapore, iland delivers the only enterprise cloud solutions in the market today with true innovation, transparency and intelligent management built in. iland’s technology and consultative approach mean anyone–regardless of expertise, location or business objective–can experience the benefits of a hassle-free cloud. From scaling production workloads, to supporting testing and development, to disaster recovery, iland’s secure cloud and decades of experience translate into unmatched service. Underscoring the strength of its platform, the company has been recognized as VMware’s Service Provider Partner of the Year, Global and Americas; is part of the Cisco Cloud Managed Service Provider Program for IaaS and DRaaS; and partners with other industry leaders including Zerto and Veeam. Visit http://www.iland.com .
